attributes.action: More cricket should be shown on terrestrial tv!
attributes.additional_details: How can the government possibly not include cricket in their "must show" list?? It is one of the most culturally English sports there is out there and the government does not show it all beause of big money making!! I simply cannot believe that many, if not all of the England football games are shown on ITV but you will seldom catch a game of cricket on a channel such as this!!
